title: Father Launches Lawsuit Against Government, Pfizer, Alleging COVID-19 Shot Led to Son’s Death
description:
Dan Hartman wants answers about the death of his son, Sean, who passed away at age 17 on Sept. 27, 2021. Sean was vaccinated for COVID-19 on Aug. 25, 2021, because he wanted to be able to continue playing his beloved hockey. 
(Dan Hartman)
